statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 0 \\ -1 \\ 2 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ -4 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ 0 \\ -5 \\ 10 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 7 \\ 0 \\ -12 \\ 24 \\ -31 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
